io.delta.kernel.client

Interface TableClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTableClient

    public interface TableClient
    Interface encapsulating all clients needed by the Delta Kernel in order to read the Delta table. Connectors are expected to pass an implementation of this interface when reading a Delta table.

    • Method Summary
